fr_BE_euro {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u20AC",
            "EUR ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "French locale for Belgium with Euro" }
        Source { "Free Software Foundation, Inc." }
        Address { "59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "French" }
        Territory { "Belgium" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-08-20" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[oOjJyY1].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN0].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "32" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "dim",
                            "lun",
                            "mar",
                            "mer",
                            "jeu",
                            "ven",
                            "sam",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "dimanche",
                            "lundi",
                            "mardi",
                            "mercredi",
                            "jeudi",
                            "vendredi",
                            "samedi",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "jan",
                            "f\u00E9v",
                            "mar",
                            "avr",
                            "mai",
                            "jun",
                            "jui",
                            "ao\u00FB",
                            "sep",
                            "oct",
                            "nov",
                            "d\u00E9c",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "janvier",
                            "f\u00E9vrier",
                            "mars",
                            "avril",
                            "mai",
                            "juin",
                            "juillet",
                            "ao\u00FBt",
                            "septembre",
                            "octobre",
                            "novembre",
                            "d\u00E9cembre",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
